source.query: SELECT * FROM SYSIBM.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME='TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='DWH'

DELETE FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS WHERE USE_RECORD_KEY IS NOT NULL
AND DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY NOT IN (SELECT USE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS))

activities.name: lkpInsertDuplicateRecordKeysIntoTmp
activities.description: Step 1: Find duplicates where all columns are similar and handle them.

source.query:
INSERT INTO DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS (DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY, USE_RECORD_KEY)
WITH DUPLICATES AS (
SELECT POST_CD, SESSION_CD, PERSON_ID, OUAC_PROGRAM_CD, OUAC_PROGRAM_DESC, OUAC_SOURCE, OUAC_SOURCE_DESC, OUAC_COOP_IND, OUAC_YEAR_LVL, OAC_INTERIM_AVERAGE_AMT, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_AMT,
   OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_ROUNDED_AMT, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_CATEGORY, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_ALT_CATEGORY, COMPOSITE_INTERIM_AVERAGE_AMT, ADMISSIONS_FINAL_AVERAGE_AMT, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_ROUNDED_AMT,
   ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_CATEGORY, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_ALT_CATEGORY, ATTENDANCE_CLASS, RESIDENCE_REQUEST_IND, RESIDENCE_REQUEST_DESC, RESIDENCE_GUARANTEE_IND, RESIDENCE_GUARANTEE_DESC,
   FEE_CATEGORY_CD, FEE_CATEGORY_DESC, FEE_CATEGORY_SHORT_NM, FEE_CATEGORY_GROUP, OUAC_PROGRAM_CATEGORY, ES_TRANSFER_DESC, START_DT, END_DT, OAC_FINAL_AVG_CATEGORY_SORT_NO,
   OAC_FINAL_AVG_ALT_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVG_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVG_ALT_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, PROCESS_TMST, BATCH_IND
   FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD 
   /*WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (2326004, 2265638, 2326006, 2265640, 2326104, 2327716, 2267355, 2355683, 2295391, 3591063, 3340713)*/
GROUP BY 
POST_CD, SESSION_CD, PERSON_ID, OUAC_PROGRAM_CD, OUAC_PROGRAM_DESC, OUAC_SOURCE, OUAC_SOURCE_DESC, OUAC_COOP_IND, OUAC_YEAR_LVL, OAC_INTERIM_AVERAGE_AMT, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_AMT,
   OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_ROUNDED_AMT, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_CATEGORY, OAC_FINAL_AVERAGE_ALT_CATEGORY, COMPOSITE_INTERIM_AVERAGE_AMT, ADMISSIONS_FINAL_AVERAGE_AMT, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_ROUNDED_AMT,
   ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_CATEGORY, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVERAGE_ALT_CATEGORY, ATTENDANCE_CLASS, RESIDENCE_REQUEST_IND, RESIDENCE_REQUEST_DESC, RESIDENCE_GUARANTEE_IND, RESIDENCE_GUARANTEE_DESC,
   FEE_CATEGORY_CD, FEE_CATEGORY_DESC, FEE_CATEGORY_SHORT_NM, FEE_CATEGORY_GROUP, OUAC_PROGRAM_CATEGORY, ES_TRANSFER_DESC, START_DT, END_DT, OAC_FINAL_AVG_CATEGORY_SORT_NO,
   OAC_FINAL_AVG_ALT_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVG_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, ADMISSION_FINAL_AVG_ALT_CATEGORY_SORT_NO, PROCESS_TMST, BATCH_IND
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
),
DUPLICATE_IDS AS (
SELECT CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY, PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT, 
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT ORDER BY CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY) as C_ID
FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD
WHERE PERSON_ID IN (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM DUPLICATES) AND SESSION_CD IN (SELECT SESSION_CD FROM DUPLICATES) AND POST_CD IN (SELECT POST_CD FROM DUPLICATES) AND START_DT IN (SELECT START_DT FROM DUPLICATES) AND END_DT IN (SELECT END_DT FROM DUPLICATES)
),
DEDUP as
(
SELECT a.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY AS DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY, b.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY AS USE_RECORD_KEY
from DUPLICATE_IDS a
INNER JOIN DUPLICATE_IDS b
ON a.PERSON_ID = b.PERSON_ID AND a.SESSION_CD=b.SESSION_CD AND a.POST_CD=b.POST_CD AND a.START_DT=b.START_DT AND a.END_DT=b.END_DT
WHERE a.C_ID > 1 AND b.C_ID = 1
)
SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY, USE_RECORD_KEY FROM DEDUP

activities.name: CopyRecordsToUpdateToCSV
activities.description: Backup records where duplicate keys will be updated to use keys.

query.value: @concat('SELECT * FROM DWH.', item(), ' WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)')

activities.name: lkpDeleteInvalidKeysInTmp
activities.description: Prerequisite: Table TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS is already populated with duplicate and use keys.  Next steps are only to remove invalid keys, and run the updates on the fact tables.

source.query: DELETE FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS WHERE USE_RECORD_KEY IS NULL OR USE_RECORD_KEY=DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY OR USE_RECORD_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)

activities.name: CopySCDDuplRecordsToCSV
activities.description: Backup records marked as Duplicate that will be deleted in the last step of the pipeline.

source.query: SELECT * FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)
